p5

Class Cheater

  • java.lang.Object
    • p5.Player
      • p5.Cheater

  • public class Cheater
extends Player
    Creates a player with the advantage of getting one point added to the dice's number if the number is lower than maximum, 50% of the time. Date: 30/11-21018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mattias JÃ¶nsson
